description:
A lightweight base layer top with an innovative seam-free construction and zoned ventilation, the 200 Zone Seamless Long Sleeve Crewe provides incredible breathability and range of motion for dynamic, high-intensity activities. The Zone’s blend of merino wool, recycled nylon and LYCRA® is durable, naturally odor-resistant, and stretchy. Integrated body-mapping technology optimizes temperature regulation, while the gusseted construction offers added mobility.

A technical knit fabric in a merino blend, icebreaker Seamless wicks moisture and breathes naturally, with integrated zones for heat-dumping and fewer seams for your comfort. Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics.
name: Icebreaker 200 Zone Seamless LS Crewe - Mens
